title: Relative Polar Multiplicities and the Real Link
abstract:
For a hypersurface defined by a complex analytic function, we obtain a chain
complex of free abelian groups, with ranks given in terms of relative polar
multiplicities, which has cohomology isomorphic to the reduced cohomology of
the real link. This leads to Morse-type inequalities between the Betti numbers
of the real link of the hypersurface and the relative polar multiplicities of
the function.
